title: LOL: Last One Laughing Germany - Halloween Special
overview: To celebrate Halloween, LOL will be airing a surprise special edition of the show packed with unnaturally funny jokes! Michael Bully Herbig will be welcoming four eerie teams of two comprising Mirja Boes & Torsten Str√§ter, Palina Rojinski & Olaf Schubert, Annette Frier & Sasha, as well as Bill & Tom Kaulitz. Andthe rules are as follows: If somebody laughs, both members of the team are out!
